entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
